DataElement.preferredName: Therapy Discontinue Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded indicator to determine clinical trial participation as to whether if therapy was discontinued as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Discontinue Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has CNS tumors, ar
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has CNS tumors, are they able to discontinue steroids for intracranial mass effect at least 7 days prior to initiation of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex -  1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient unable to discontinue concomitant proton-pump inhibitors (PPIs) greater than or equal to 5 days prior to study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have they been discontinued 7 days prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have they been discontinued at least 7 days prior to the first dose of ZEN003694?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have they been discontinued 7 days prior to initiating the trial?
